name: Breakpoint (Quade Zaban, ompu co, harrisonbright, Baycunn, Levus)
name_original: Breakpoint (Quade Zaban, ompu co, harrisonbright, Baycunn, Levus)
description:
CONTROLS:

Controller:

Left Stick - Move

A - Jump

RB/LB - Rotate Camera 

Keyboard:

WASD - Move

Space- Jump

Left/Right Arrow Keys - Rotate Camera 

Escape - Quit Game

CREDITS:

                Baycun                  Sam Blye                  Harrison Bright             Levi Davis         

Jesse Hamel                Austin Hibbs            Quade Zaban

Soundtrack Download: https://aheadofitstime.bandcamp.com/album/breakpoint-ost

Warning: This game features rapidly flashing lights. Please play at your own discretion.

Known Issues: 

  • Input problems may occur at refresh rates higher than 60Hz. 
  • Ledge collision detection is currently inconsistent.
  • Keyboard input is poor at the moment. A controller is recommended.
